com.inepex.hyperconnector.serialization
Interface HyperSerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BinarySerializer, PlainTextSerializer
public interface HyperSerializer

Interface for serializing and deserializing HyperEntity values.

Author:
Gabor Dicso

Method Summary
 byte[] getValue()
          Returns the serialized value of the values written into the serializer as a byte array.
 java.lang.String getValueAsNonNullCharString()
          Returns the return value of getValue() as a specially encoded string that does not contain '\0' characters.
 java.lang.String getValueAsString()
          Returns the return value of getValue() as a string.

 void setValueAsNonNullCharString(java.lang.String value)

Method Detail

getValue

byte[] getValue()
Returns the serialized value of the values written into the serializer as a byte array.

setValue

void setValue(byte[] value)
Sets the serialized value as a byte array. Values can be read from the serializer afterwards in the order they were written into it.

getValueAsString

java.lang.String getValueAsString()
Returns the return value of getValue() as a string.

setValueAsString

void setValueAsString(java.lang.String value)
Wraps setValue(byte[] value), allows setting the value as a string.

getValueAsNonNullCharString

java.lang.String getValueAsNonNullCharString()
Returns the return value of getValue() as a specially encoded string that does not contain '\0' characters.

setValueAsNonNullCharString

void setValueAsNonNullCharString(java.lang.String value)
Wraps setValue(byte[] value), allows setting the value as a specially encoded string that does not contain '\0' characters.

reset

void reset()
Resets the internal state of the serializer.
